name: Ludwig Game Jam 2023 - The Button Featuring Coots
name_original: Ludwig Game Jam 2023 - The Button Featuring Coots
description:
Hello everybody, this is The Button Featuring Coots, Ludwig's cat. This is my FIRST every officially finished game so it definitely isn't the best but I am still proud of it. I really hope you enjoy this game, and I wish goodluck to the rest of the contestants!

How To Play:

1. Hover your MOUSE over the speech bubbles to reveal the key you need to press [ARROW KEYS].

2. When you press a key it will get rid of said speech bubble.

3. Make sure you press the correct key to keep the date interested.

4. The Button will activate after a RANDOM amount of time OR after you get rid of the speech bubbles.

5. To press The Button hover over The Button and press SPACE.

You have FIVE dates and there are FOUR ENDINGS. Enjoy!

GitHub Repo: https://github.com/Craftplays/LudwigGameJam2023
